meanings.definition: The quality or state of being meaty.
meanings.sent1: The meatinesses of the stew made it very satisfying.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the meatinesses of a juicy steak.
meanings.sent3: The meatinesses of the burger was so intense, it almost felt like a meat overload.
meanings.sent4: Her argument lacked the meatinesses needed to convince the audience.
meanings.sent5: The meatinesses of the barbecue ribs was so rich and flavorful.

meanings.definition: The amount of meat present in something.
meanings.sent1: The meatinesses of the sandwich was impressive.
meanings.sent2: I prefer dishes with a high level of meatinesses.
meanings.sent3: The meatinesses of the pizza was so generous, it was like a meat lover's dream.
meanings.sent4: The meatinesses of the soup was so abundant, it felt like a hearty meal.
meanings.sent5: The meatinesses of the lasagna was so satisfying and filling.

meanings.definition: The essence or substance of something.
meanings.sent1: The meatinesses of the story captivated the readers.
meanings.sent2: The meatinesses of the issue became clear after further investigation.
meanings.sent3: The meatinesses of the joke left everyone laughing for hours.
meanings.sent4: The meatinesses of the song's lyrics resonated with the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The meatinesses of the debate highlighted the core arguments.
